item.original: Scrape off any large chunks of food from the plate.
Submerge the dishes in warm water.
Add dish soap to the warm water.
Let the dishes soak for about 15-30 mins.
Scrub the dishes to make sure no food is sticking to them.
Rinse the dishes under water to clean off the soap and any other food particles.
Gently dry the dishes with a dish cloth.
Leave the dishes on the counter on top of the cloth (or on a dish rack) to dry
Fill sink with water and dish soap
Place dishes in rack to dry
Fill the sink with water and soap

place clean dishes in rack to air dry

Put all dishes in the container

We clean all the dirtier items

Washing dishes is a major work done in houses, restaurant and all eatable place.
First take cleaning liquid in a bowl.
On account of the dishes to be cleaned take enough liquid.
First pour some water on the dishes so that food particles etc., will run off.
Then take each and every dish clean with spongy filled with cleaning liquid.
Wash the dish till cleaning liquid goes.
Wipe the dishes for dry with a dry cloth.
Arrange all the dishes in the stand or preferred place
rinse any grease or sticky stuff

Add dish soap while water is sill running

Rack the wet dish on drying rack
